meanings.sent1: The rubber band was extensible, so I could stretch it easily.
meanings.sent2: The extensible rope allowed us to reach the top of the tree.
meanings.sent3: The extensible balloon kept getting bigger and bigger, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was like an extensible rubber band, always able to stretch a little more.
meanings.sent5: The extensible bridge seemed to reach across the river endlessly.

meanings.definition: Able to be stretched or expanded
meanings.sent1: The dough was extensible, making it easy to shape into different forms.
meanings.sent2: The extensible fabric allowed for comfortable movement.
meanings.sent3: The extensible rubber band kept growing longer, almost like magic.
meanings.sent4: His mind was an extensible canvas, always open to new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The extensible accordion could produce a wide range of musical notes.

meanings.definition: Designed to allow for future additions or modifications
meanings.sent1: The extensible software could easily accommodate new features.
meanings.sent2: The extensible backpack had extra pockets for more storage.
meanings.sent3: The extensible garden hose magically extended to reach the farthest plants.
meanings.sent4: Her extensible plan was like a puzzle, ready to fit in new pieces.
meanings.sent5: The extensible building design allowed for future expansions seamlessly.
